title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, embedders or tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with conversation memory and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Lightweight GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust client crate for Ollama with async support and strong typing.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM library for integrating Ollama models into Kotlin, Scala or Java apps.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot frontend that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama to use local LLMs in retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, RAG, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Host your own Discord bot backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: End-to-end RAG question-answering template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger CI module to spin up Ollama containers and run model tests in pipelines.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor sidebar.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Custom n8n node to integrate Ollama LLMs into no-code workflows.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client SDK for Ollama (used internally by the CLI).

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and streams replies.
